about_the_game:
Brasil Fusion is a free-to-play game with different game modes.
Championships, disputes with friends or the famous Battle royale will show who are the best favela players in the world.
In the weekly and monthly selective championship mode, the best will classify for the grand finale of the season.
In training mode you invite a friend to see who survives in the favelas the longest.
Everyone's favelas have their own e-sports, just hop in.
Unusual weapons (Rifle-Pistol), incredible dances and a soundtrack like you've never seen, in addition to weekly prizes!
